div.pre: 2237 Pertusi, 45 km. SW of Messina, 1950 Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Crawford) Contents: 46 AE Rhegium: 28 Mamertines: 4 Syracuse: 2 (Agathocles, Hieron II) Roman Rep.: 1 (semi-libral sextans) Unc.: 11 Disposition: Syracuse Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, p. 229 (s.v.
